data.title: THE NEW BABYLON
data.meta_description: photo: Robert Menczel Grigori Kosinzew/Leonid Trauberg, soviet union 1929, silent movie with experimental live music on five (e-)guitars composed and played by The Interstring Project, created for Europäische Kulturtage 2018. 2.5.2018 Badisches Staatstheater Karlsruhe4.5.2018 Kinemathek Karlsruhe title photo: Cineteca del Friuli
data.text:
photo: Robert Menczel

Grigori Kosinzew/Leonid Trauberg, soviet union 1929, silent movie with experimental live music on five (e-)guitars composed and played by The Interstring Project, created for Europäische Kulturtage 2018.

2.5.2018 Badisches Staatstheater Karlsruhe

4.5.2018 Kinemathek Karlsruhe

title photo: Cineteca del Friuli
